description: Gobbledegook is a Pac-Man clone. As always the player controls his gobbler through a maze and has to collect as many spots as possible without being eaten by the gooks that chase him. Eating a powerpack allows the gobbler to go after the gooks for seven seconds. If eaten by a gook the player loses one of his three lives until it's game over. Before starting a game the player can choose how gooks move at the junctions. Logic A means a random choice from all exits except the one entered while logic B means a random choice from all exits. Logic B is meant to be easier.
title: Gobbledegook

description: Alien Defender is a single screen shooter where the idea is to move around the screen in your spacecraft blasting as many aliens as you can trying to have more kills than the aliens. When you blast an alien your kill score increases but if you are touched then the aliens kill score increases. Before the start of the game you can select the speed from 1 - 999 with one being the fastest and as you play the speed increases. Moving off the edge of the screen makes you appear on the opposite side.
title: Alien Defender

description:
Zombies & Potholes is a single screen game where the aim is to move around the screen avoiding being touched and killed by zombies while trying to get them to fall down potholes. You are able to move up, down, sideways and diagonally in eight directions and you move one place at a time but pressing S allows you to stay in the same spot for a turn. Once you moved one place, then all the zombies on screen move one place towards you. If you have a pothole between you and the zombie then he will fall into it and once the screen is cleared then you add a point to your win score. Get touched by a zombie and you add a point to your lose score. Two players can play and one player keeps playing before allowing the other player a turn.

Before the game you can adjust various parameters and they are, Logic (A or B) which allows you to move off the screen and appear on the opposite side or not, Thinking Time (2 - 100) which is how many seconds to move before the zombies do, Packing Density (10 - 100) which is the number of zombies and potholes on screen, and Difficulty Level (10 - 100).

sample_screenshots.caption: A Zombie will be falling into a pothole

title: Zombies & Potholes

description: Swamp Monsters is a top view game with the screen scrolling constantly from left to right as you drive a boat along a river killing as many Swamp Monsters as you can. You can move your boat up or down trying to hit the Swamp Monsters but you must avoid the sides of the river and mines and if you hit the sides or a mine then it is game over. There are two speeds that can be selected and they are Normal and Fast.
title: Swamp Monsters

description: Space Battle is a single screen shooter where you must move around the screen blasting the various formations of aliens that appear for as long as possible. You can move in eight directions while firing your laser but if you touch an alien then it is game over. You are able to move off the screen to appear on the opposite side and there is also an option to play a faster or slower game.
title: Space Battle

description: Owler is a word game where you have to guess a five letter word the computer is thinking off by using an owl to pick up letters. The letters sit on the bottom of the screen and change after a few seconds and you must pick up a letter with the owl and place it at the top of the screen. If the letter is correct then a tick appears underneath it but if wrong an arrow appears in the direction on how close it is to the letter A. You can pick the letters back up and place them on the bottom of the screen. As you fly around the screen, a gremlin flies around as well and if you touch it then it is game over.

sample_screenshots.caption: Haven't found the correct ones so far

title: Owler

description: Othello is based on the board game where two players try to get the most counters on a 8 x 8 grid. The game starts with each player having two counters in the centre of the board diagonally from each other. Each player then proceeds to place a counter either vertical, horizontal or diagonally from one of their counters with the other players counters in between. Any counters in between then get turned to that players own colour and then it is the next players turn. The game is won when the board is full or both players can't place a counter, and the player with the most is the winner. A player can either play against the computer or another person.
title: Othello

description: Meteor Racer is a side view horizontal shooter where your ship is on the right of the screen and must shoot or avoid meteors that appear on the left of the screen. You can move your ship up or down and if you hit a meteor then you lose one of three lives.
title: Meteor Racer

description: Inspired by the arcade game Pac-Man, Micro Maze is a single screen maze game where you must move around a maze and eat all the dots. As you eat the dots, two creatures move around the maze attempting to catch you and if they do then it is game over. There are a choice of three mazes.
title: Micro Maze

description: Memory Stars is inspired by the electronic game Simon, from the 70s and 80s where you have to repeat a sequence the computer gives you. After selecting a skill level (1-5) you then see a collection of stars and a sound for a few seconds in either the top right, top left, bottom right or bottom left on the screen. You then press a number (1-4) where you think the stars appeared and if correct then the same position appears for a few seconds before a new position of stars appears. You keep matching the sequence until you get it wrong and it is game over.
title: Memory Stars

description: You are Jumpman and your aim in this single screen platform game is to collect all the fruit before ringing a bell on the top left of the screen. You must collect all the fruits in a certain order with the next fruit to collect shown on the bottom of the screen. There are various creatures and obstacles that need avoiding like springs, skulls and gaps in the platforms and if you touch one then you lose one of three lives. To get to higher platforms you can take a lift but can lose a life if not entered or exited correctly.
title: Jumpman

description: Green Cross Frog is a single screen game where you have to get a frog across the screen from left to right while avoiding the traffic that moves up or down. You can move your frog in four directions and if you touch any of the vehicles then you lose one of five lives. There is an option to play a fast or slow game.
title: Green Cross Frog

description: Frogger is a single screen game based on the arcade game, where you have to get a frog from the bottom of the screen to one of five gaps at the top of the screen before a timer runs out. Your frog has to cross a road full of traffic which is moving left or right across the screen before attempting to cross a river with crocodiles. Once the road has been crossed there is a path to take a short rest bite, but there is a snake that moves along the path to avoid. To cross the river you have to use the moving logs and turtles but the turtles only stay above water for a short time. Once your frog is in a gap at the top of the screen you then attempt to get another frog to the top but cannot move into a gap already occupied. If you hit the traffic, snake, crocodile, fall in the water of move into a occupied gap, then you lose one of three lives.
title: Frogger

description: Firebird is a side view single screen shooter where you have to blast Fuel Cells and giant birds to destroy an alien invasion. The first level sees you at the bottom of the screen having to blast six fuel cells at the top of the screen. You can move left or right and as you blast you must avoid meteors and avoid or shoot a saucer that both move downwards. Once all six cells are destroyed, you move to the next level where you must blast eight birds that move two at a time down the screen. You are once again on the bottom of the screen and as well as blasting the birds you must avoid meteors and avoid or shoot other objects. You are also able to Hyperspace to move to another part of the screen. If you touch any object (except birds) then this reduces your fuel levels and when your fuel runs out it is game over.
title: Firebird

description: Inspired by the arcade game Pac-Man, and based on the game Micro Maze, Dot Man is a single screen maze game where you must move around a maze and eat all the dots. As you eat the dots, two creatures move around the maze attempting to catch you and if they do then it is game over. There is also an option to play a faster game.
title: Dot Man

description:
The deep space cargo vessel, Cygnus has been attacked by pirates from the planet Retipujeca who have killed all the crew and stolen all the cargo. As the incident was in your sector, you the leader of a Galaxy Patrol squad must board the vessel to investigate what happened on board. As the boarding hatch is damaged, and the only way to enter is with a backpack, you have also decided to go alone and to also prove your worth as a leader.

Cygnus is an arcade adventure where you must investigate three floors of the vessel, with each floor shown on the whole screen from above. You must move from room to room as quick as possible as there is only a limited supply of oxygen. Objects like keys can be found and used elsewhere on the vessel. Also on board are robots which move around the vessel and will shoot at anyone on board and if you are shot, touch a robot or run out of air, then it is game over.
title: Cygnus

description: Centipede is based on the arcade game where you control a craft at the bottom of the screen and blast a Centipede at the top of the screen, moving across the screen and downwards when it hits the edge of the screen or a mushroom. When you hit the Centipede it splits into two and moves in different directions, and hitting the new Centipedes creates more moving across the screen. Blasting mushrooms give you bonus points and you are able to move forwards up the screen a short distance. If you are touched by any part of the Centipede then you lose one of three lives.
title: Centipede

description: Cavern Attack is a side view scrolling game where you control a submarine, moving up or down, to destroy as many monsters as you can. The screen scrolls constantly from left to right and you must avoid touching the sides of the cavern as you ram the monsters. The monsters have spat out torpedoes and these need avoiding and if you touch one or the sides of the cavern, then it is game over. There is an option to play a Slow or Fast game.
title: Cavern Attack

description: Black Island Adventure is a text adventure over various chapters where you start your adventure in a harbour of a great city. Further investigation of the harbour, you soon realise it is deserted due to an outbreak of a plague and thus the adventure begins. The screen has text describing each location you visit and you type in commands with the keyboard to interact with each location.
title: Black Island Adventure

description: Amazing Maze is a maze game where you are put in the centre and you have to find a route to a exit off the edge of the maze. At the start you can select the size of the maze (2-85) before being placed in the centre and moving in four directions.

sample_screenshots.caption: Pick the size of the maze

title: Amazing Maze

description:
You have been separated from your friends while walking on the moors when a storm appeared and now you are lost with dusk falling. You have managed to come across shelter called Haunted Hall and discovered it is empty except for all the coffins that lay around the place. The door to leave the place has disappeared so you have no choice but to explore to find another exit but entering the attic you realise you are not alone with the many rooms full of ghosts and poltergeists.

Atic Raid is an top view flick-screen arcade adventure where you must move around the 100 rooms of the attic finding objects to use like keys and transporters to get to the exit. Once you find a way out of the attic you must attempt to navigate a maze to finally find freedom. In each room is a ghost and occasionally poltergeists but boomerangs can also be found to shoot and stun them. Food is also needed to be found to stay alive and if you touch a ghost or poltergeist then you lose one of 20 lives.
title: Atic Raid

description:
Ace Invaders is a single screen side view shooter based on the arcade game Space Invaders where you control a spacecraft at the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, to destroy aliens above. The aliens are in formation and move across the screen left to right and when they reach the side of the screen, they appear on the other side, one place lower. You are armed with missiles to fire upwards and there are four shields to protect you from the bombs dropped by the aliens, but the shields start to disappear when hit from the alien's bombs or your missiles. If you are hit by a bomb or allow the aliens to reach the bottom of the screen then it is game over. There is an option to play a Fast or Slow game.

The game was re-released by Micro Marketing Ltd with some slight graphical details and no option for a Fast or Slow game.
title: Ace Invaders

description: ACE Invaders is a side view single screen shooter where you control a spacecraft at the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, and blast various aliens that appear at the top of the screen moving downwards. You must keep blasting the aliens to prevent them from landing on the bottom of the screen and if one reaches the bottom then it is game over.
title: Ace Invaders

description: On a fact-finding tour of Jupiter in the 23rd century you have discovered the planet being invaded by aliens and they need to be stopped. The aliens have the ability to land on a planet to take over it with their brainwashing gas so you must keep blasting them to stop them landing on the surface. Ace Invasion is a side view single screen shooter where you control a spacecraft at the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, to blast aliens that appear from the top of the screen moving downwards. The aliens appear one at a time and must be blasted before they land on the bottom of the screen or it is game over.
title: Ace Invasion

description: Towers of Hanoi is a puzzle game where the idea is to move a pyramid of seven disks of varying sizes in order from Peg 1 to Peg 3. You can move a disk to Peg 1, 2 or 3 but you can't place a disk on another disk that is smaller. As you move a disk your moves counter increases so the aim is to complete the puzzle in the fewest moves.
title: Towers of Hanoi

description: 3D Maze is a 1st person perspective maze game where you must move around a maze trying to find the exit. At the start of the game you can adjust the size from 3x3 to 20x20 rooms, before looking at a plan of the maze to memorise. When you are moving around the maze in four directions, you can bring up a map of the maze to help find your way around. As well as finding the exit, the aim is to also escape in the fewest number of steps and looking at the map for help.

sample_screenshots.caption: Lets go for a big maze

title: 3D Maze

description:
Titan Defender + Dual Duel is a double games pack that contains the following games:

Titan Defender: In this 1st person perspective shooter, you are the Chief Engineer on one of Saturn's moons, Titan in the year 2085. Your job is to look after the power source that keeps the mining community running, microwave arrays, which orbit in space. A threat has now arose from the alien race Carians who are seeking to destroy communities and mining stations in the Solar System due to a Sigmagtobin Export Embargo which led to many of their colonies being infected by Chtorophage. You must control a sight and blast as many Carian Combat Scout Crafts as you can, as well as any Mystons floating in space. Using the sights decreases it's power so you must refuel with any microwave arrays, that you find. The screen scrolls in various directions when you move the sight.

Dual Duel: A single screen game where you can play against either the computer or another player. You control a creature with a short tail and as you move around the screen constantly, the tail grows, which is the same for your opponent. The aim is to get your opponent to crash into your tail while avoiding hitting theirs and if either player crashes then they lose one of seven lives. You also lose a life if you move back on yourself and if both creatures hit head-on then the outcome is 50-50.

sample_screenshots.caption: Dual Duel: Leaving a trail behind
Titan Defender: Lets destroy the Carian

title: Titan Defender + Dual Duel

description: Tetris is a single screen game where the idea is to stop falling pieces from building up and touching the top of the playing area. Each piece that falls one at a time, is made up of four blocks in various shapes, and can be moved left or right, turned left or right, and dropped down faster. Once the piece hits the bottom of the screen then it can't be moved or turned. As more pieces fall and settle on the bottom, you must try to make solid horizontal lines which when made will disappear and the blocks above fall down. Making so many lines moves you up a level and the more levels you play the faster the pieces fall down. You are able to see the next piece that will fall to plan your moves and when the pieces touch the top of the screen it is game over.
title: Tetris

description:
Missile Man + Space Fighter Pilot is a double games pack that contains the following games:

Missile Man: A single screen shooter where you control a spacecraft at the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, firing missiles upwards to blast aliens above. The aliens are in formation and move to the left and right and will drop bombs which need avoiding. One of the aliens will break from formation and fall downwards diagonally dropping bombs and if you touch a bomb or an alien then you lose one of three lives.

Space Fighter Pilot: Starting on a runway, you take-off into deep space where you have the ability to warp at two speeds looking for missiles that are being fired. As you warp through space you can select to stop and stop the missiles by controlling a sight at the top of the screen attempting to hit any missiles moving upwards. You can warp at anytime to look for more missiles.

sample_screenshots.caption: Space Fighter Pilot: Hit the missiles
Space Fighter Pilot: Ready for take-off

title: Missile Man + Space Fighter Pilot

description: SokoACE is a single screen top view puzzle game where the aim is to get all the boxes on to target dots over 30 maps. Each map is made up of walls and passageways and located in the passageways are a number of boxes and the same amount of target dots. You can only push the boxes, you can't pull them or push more than one box together. Once all the boxes are on the dots you move to the next map but you can move to any map at any time.
title: SokoACE

description: Sudoku is a puzzle game where you have to fill a grid made up of 3 x 3 squares with numbers. Each square has a further nine squares and the numbers 1-9 must be used to fill the whole grid. There are twenty grids to play and each grid has numbers already in them to start with. When placing a number, you must take into consideration that a row or column on the whole grid musn't contain the same number and one of the 3 x 3 squares must also not contain the same number. Any of the grids can be edited to create your own puzzles.
title: Sudoku

description:
Puzzle / Bombs is a double games pack that contains the following games:

Puzzle: A 5 x 5 grid is full of letters in alphabetical order with one blank square and after being mixed up the aim is to put the squares back in order. The squares can be slid into the blank square and while you play there is a clock and the number of moves you have taken.

Bombs: You control a paddle in the middle of the screen, moving left or right, and you have to protect buildings below by hitting various bombs that are falling from the top of the screen. Each game lasts for 30 seconds and a score is given at the end based on how much of the buildings are left. There are nine skill levels (1-9) to choose from with one being the easiest.

sample_screenshots.caption: Bombs: The building are getting hit

title: Puzzle / Bombs

description:
Overtaker + Brands Hatch is a double game pack that contains two top view driving games. The games are:

Overtaker: The aim is to drive up a constantly scrolling road avoiding the other cars for as many points as possible before a clock counts down to zero. You move your car left or right and you can accelerate which makes the other cars appear faster but you receive more points.

Brands Hatch: The aim is to drive around a track on a single screen over five laps in the quickest time. You control your car by turning left or right but have no control over the speed. There are other cars that are static in various places on the track and if you hit them or the sides of the track this stops your car.

sample_screenshots.caption: Brand Hatch: Nearly completed a lap
Brand Hatch: Race around the course

title: Overtaker + Brands Hatch

description:
Moo + Hangman is a double games pack that contains the following games:

Moo: Based on the board game Mastermind, the idea is to guess a four digit number the computer is thinking off. Once you enter a number, the computer will tell you how many digits are correct and in the right place (Bulls) and how many are correct but in the wrong place (Cows).

Hangman: A two player game based on the pen and paper game where one player enters a word and the other player has to guess it. The player guessing enters a letter and if correct then the letter appears in the word and if it is wrong then part of a scaffold appears. After so many guesses and a picture of a scaffold appears with a hanged man, then that player has lost.

sample_screenshots.caption: Hangman: Can you guess the word?

title: Moo + Hangman

description:
Greedy Gobbler + Blowing up the Worldis a double games pack that contains the following games:

Greedy Gobbler: Based on the arcade game Pac-Man, the game is a single screen maze game where you have to eat all the dots. As you eat all the dots, Ghosts move around the maze trying to kill you and if they touch you then you lose one of three lives. In the corners are four power-pills, and if eaten allow you to chase and eat the Ghosts for a short period.

Blowing up the World: A cursor moves across the top of the screen from left to right above a map of the World, and when it reaches the edge of the screen, it appears on the left side again. The aim of the game is to keep bombing the world until it is completely removed before a timer reaches zero. You use the keys 1-8 which allows you to vary the distance of the bomb exploding from your cursor.

sample_screenshots.caption: Greedy Gobbler: Chase and eat the ghosts
Greedy Gobbler: Lets eat all the dots
Blowing up the World: Think my house is still OK
Blowing up the World: Map of the world to destroy

title: Greedy Gobbler + Blowing up the World

description:
Fish + Flutterer is a double games pack that contains the following games:

Fish: In this side view horizontal scrolling game, you play the role of a fish who has to eat as much food as you can, with the food moving across the screen from right to left. You can move the fish up or down but you must keep moving to the right as current pulls you to the left of the screen and if you reach the edge of the screen then it is game over.

Flutterer: A single screen side view shooter where you control a spacecraft at the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, to shoot missiles upwards to destroy Flutterers. The Flutterers fall down from the top of the screen and must be shot before they reach the bottom of the screen or it is game over. There is an option for a Fast or Slow game.
title: Fish + Flutterer

description:
Duckshoot, Minefield & Zapem is a collection of three games that contains the following:

Duckshoot: All the fun of the fair in this single screen shooter where you move an arrow, left or right, at the bottom of the screen to hit targets at the top of the screen. The targets are two rows of ducks which move left to right across the screen, and a row of targets in between that appear and disappear. You must shoot as many as you can before your time runs out. There is an option to play a fast game.

Minefield: In this top view single screen game, you must move from the top left of the screen and get home in the bottom right of the screen. Problem is the screen is full of mines which cannot be seen and the amount is shown at the top. You are able to move one place at a time in eight directions and you are told how many mines are next to you. If you touch a mine then it is game over and there is an option to play a fast game.

Zapem: A single screen shooter where you move around the screen blasting aliens before a timer runs out. Your ship can turn 360 degrees in both directions and you press the number 9 to move forwards. The aliens can be touched and it is game over when the timer reaches zero. There is an option to play a fast game.
title: Duckshoot, Minefield & Zapem

description:
Champs De Mines + Casse Briques is a double games pack that contains the following:

Champs De Mines: In this top view single screen game, the idea is to get from the bottom of the screen to the top. Problem is that the screen is full of mines that cannot be seen. You move one place at a time in four directions and as you move you will be told how many mines are next to you. It is game over if you touch a mine and you can adjust the amount of mines on the screen.

Casse Briques: A Breakout clone that sees you moving a bat at the bottom of the screen, left or right, and you have to hit a ball and remove bricks above. If the ball goes past the bat then you lose one of nine lives but the amount of lives can be adjusted.

sample_screenshots.caption: Champs De Mines: Get to the top of the screen
Casse Briques: Bricks starting to be removed

title: Champs De Mines + Casse Briques

description: You are the pilot of a plane that has run out of fuel and so your only option is to glide the plane down to land. Problem is the only place below is a city and so your only option is to bomb the city to remove the buildings. The game is viewed from the side on a single screen and your plane starts in the top left of the screen and moves across. When the plane reaches the right side it appears on the left but one place down. You must keep dropping bombs and if you touch a building it is game over.
title: Bomber
